hero.name: Adarsh Kumar
hero.about: I'm Adarsh Kumar, a dedicated full-stack web developer with 2 years of experience. I specialize in JavaScript, React.js, Node.js, and Python, and have expertise in cloud platforms like AWS and GCP. I excel in delivering high-quality code and collaborating with cross-functional teams to create innovative web solutions. Continuous learning and pushing the boundaries of web development drive me forward.
hero.experienceMessage: In this section, I outline my professional experience, highlighting the positions I have held and the organizations I have worked with. For each role, I include a brief description of my responsibilities and accomplishments. This section helps provide a comprehensive view of my career progression and the value I bring to the table.
hero.projectsMessage: In this section, I have highlighted some of the notable projects I have worked on. Each project includes a brief description, my role, the technologies or tools used, and any relevant outcomes or achievements. Feel free to explore the projects and learn more about my capabilities.
hero.contactmessage: Want to get in touch with me?

skills.desc: This section provides an overview of my skills and proficiencies. I have acquired expertise in various areas throughout my career, and I am constantly updating and expanding my skill set. Here are some of the key skills I possess:

experience.title: Software Engineer
experience.description: Developed web applications using React and Node.js.

experience.title: Full Stack Web Engineer
experience.description: In my role, I developed complex dashboards on the frontend using React, incorporating libraries like react-table, charts, and forms. I utilized Redux for state management and integrated Auth0 for login and protected routes. On the backend (Node + Express), I created multiple APIs to support product functionality, connecting them to the frontend and integrating AWS/GCP APIs for data retrieval. I worked on setting up an AWS 2-tier architecture, deployed the server on EC2 with NGINX and Forever, and implemented CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions on AWS EC2.

experience.title: Full stack Web Developer
experience.description: During my internship at Quleep, I worked as a Full-Stack Web Developer, utilizing React.js, Node.js, Express.js, and AWS services like EC2, S3, and DynamoDB. I independently developed the company's product website, integrated payment gateways, performed robust testing using Selenium, and implemented a CI/CD approach for efficient deployment of high-quality web applications.

experience.title: Technical Content Writer
experience.description: I contributed to the company's blog by writing engaging and informative articles on technical topics like Web Hosting, Website Layout, Industry 4.0, AI Importance, and Bounce Rate. Through high-quality blog posts, I demonstrated strong knowledge of the latest trends, improved the company's thought leadership, and effectively communicated complex technical concepts to a broad audience.

education.school: Bengal College of Engineering & Technology, Durgapur
education.description: Here, I detail my educational background, including degrees, certifications, or relevant courses. Education plays a crucial role in shaping our skills and knowledge, and I am proud to share my academic achievements in this section.
